title: Digital Gleamy Watch Face
summary: Watch design with colorful backgrounds, weather updates and other features.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Get simply fashionable with Digital Gleamy watchface for your android wear. This watch is laden with 5 beautiful color backgrounds, large font time display, weather, wind and humidity update this watch face will be in your personal favorites. FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:- Multiple colored themes Digital dials with large font for easy reading Weather update Wind and Humidity update watch and mobile battery update Unique design ultimate readability Clean and simplistic look Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Get simply fashionable with Digital Gleamy watchface for your android wear. This watch is laden with 5 beautiful color backgrounds, large font time display, weather, wind and humidity update this watch face will be in your personal favorites.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

 Multiple colored themes
 Digital dials with large font for easy reading
 Weather update
 Wind and Humidity update
 watch and mobile battery update
 Unique design ultimate readability
 Clean and simplistic look
 Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
